object.name: readBusinessMessage
object.description: Marks incoming message as read on behalf of a business account. Requires the can_read_messages business bot right. Returns True on success.
object.html_description: Marks incoming message as read on behalf of a business account. Requires the can_read_messages business bot right. Returns True on success.
object.rst_description: Marks incoming message as read on behalf of a business account. Requires the *can_read_messages* business bot right. Returns :code:`True` on success.

annotations.description: Unique identifier of the business connection on behalf of which to read the message
annotations.html_description: Unique identifier of the business connection on behalf of which to read the message
annotations.rst_description: Unique identifier of the business connection on behalf of which to read the message
annotations.name: business_connection_id

annotations.description: Unique identifier of the chat in which the message was received. The chat must have been active in the last 24 hours.
annotations.html_description: Unique identifier of the chat in which the message was received. The chat must have been active in the last 24 hours.
annotations.rst_description: Unique identifier of the chat in which the message was received. The chat must have been active in the last 24 hours.
annotations.name: chat_id

annotations.description: Unique identifier of the message to mark as read
annotations.html_description: Unique identifier of the message to mark as read
annotations.rst_description: Unique identifier of the message to mark as read
annotations.name: message_id
